programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: CNBC's flagship show covering the opening of the Asian markets, and all the latest business news. Anchored by Martin Soong, Karen Tso and Bernie Lo, the program brings the most important business stories of the day, followed by analysis from experts.

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: With Matthew Taylor at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Hadley Gamble at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Capital Connection delivers the main stories from Asia's markets, and primes traders for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Marc Dreier is a high-powered lawyer with celebrity clients. But Dreier is a conman and steals more than $700 million from hedge funds.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Arthur Nadel conjures a $330 million hedge fund. In the blink of an eye, he disappears and leaves clients without their life savings.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: In this episode of the Managing Asia Sustainable Future series, Christine Tan speaks to business leaders from three companies in the region, Siam Piwat Group, Panasonic Holdings, and Lendlease, to find out how they are tapping into future trends to build a sustainable business.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: In the last episode of two-part series, Managing Asia's Christine Tan looks at how three companies: Beximco, Kawada Technologies, and the Plastic Credit Exchange?are tackling different challenges by capitalizing on future trends to build more sustainable and inclusive businesses.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Anchored by Brian Sullivan, With skillful reporters to unlock the scope of each story and informed guests to share their opinions, Worldwide Exchange covers every morsel of international business.
